# Getting Started: Installation

## Clone Repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/kyounghunJang/Medisecuremask
```

## Language and Requirement

- Python
- Spark 3.0 â†‘
- MySQL 
- Flask
- boto3
- pillow
- easyocr
- opencv
- numpy
- pandas

### MySQL Download Doc
[https://docs.inductiveautomation.com/display/DOC80/Installing+MySQL](https://docs.inductiveautomation.com/display/DOC80/Installing+MySQL)

### Pyspark Downlod Doc
[https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/getting_started/install.html](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/getting_started/install.html)

### Download Python Libraries
```bash
pip install Flask boto3 Pillow easyocr opencv-python numpy pandas
```
